lead_paragraph: Chelsea crushed Everton 5-0 on Saturday to storm to the top of the Premier League with a vintage display after Manchester City were held 1-1 at home by a last-minute goal from promoted Middlesbrough.

headline.print_headline: Sparkling Chelsea Go Top After City Are Held
headline.main: Sparkling Chelsea Go Top After City Are Held

snippet: Chelsea crushed Everton 5-0 on Saturday to storm to the top of the Premier League with a vintage display after Manchester City were held 1-1 at home by a last-minute goal from promoted Middlesbrough....
